title: Second Language Vocabulary Learning Program Using Multimodal Tools

context.additional_context: Conducted through parallel real-time video lectures and mobile applications in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can recognize and utilize 300 beginner-level vocabulary words in the target language (Chinese) with over 80% accuracy after six months.
Learners can determine the semantic consistency between emojis and text with 90% accuracy.
Learners can independently apply vocabulary-learning strategies using multimodal tools (emojis + text).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
